title: ISic000152. Funerary inscription for a Claud[---] Fort[---]
body:
Facsimile Images

1CLAUD[---]
2FORT.[---]
3VIX[...---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after autopsy

English translation

Claud[...] Fortu[...] lived for [...]

commentary

The lack of a praenomen on the stone means that it is most likely that the epitaph was for a woman, most plausibly called Claudia Fortunata, but as Bivona observes there are instances of male individuals lacking a praenomen in the Termini corpus also (e.g. ISic000153), so this is hardly conclusive.

bibliography

  • 71 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Fiorelli NSA 1889 139 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • VIII 703 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002649
